raijin.appconfig

This module combines the functionality of VariantConfig and configpath into one class.

Author:
Paul Crane

class AppConfig;
This class combines the functionality of VariantConfig and configpath into one class.

this();
Used for creating directories in users config directory and setting up the config file app.config.

@safe this(const string organizationName, const string applicationName, const string defaultConfigFileData = string.init);
Overload that allows setting of organizationName, applicationName and defaultConfigFileData to be used when creating directories in users config directory and setting up the config file app.config.

Params:
string organizationName Name of the organization/company.
string applicationName Name of the application.
string defaultConfigFileData The data app.config should be populated with if app.config isn't found.

@property ConfigPath path();
Helper property for accessing ConfigPath methods.

Returns:
A ConfigPath object.

@property VariantConfig config();
Helper property for accessing VariantConfig methods.

Returns:
A VariantConfig object.
